title.narrative: Women’s Empowerment and Sustainable farming in the Bolivian Andes (PASOS)

description.narrative: Through this project, Heifer Bolivia will support smallholder farmers by integrating value chains that strengthen local economies and improve production systems. Participating farmers will produce, collect, process and market amaranth, honey, corn, peanuts and chili peppers. Additionally, comprehensive and sustainable family farming plans based on environmentally friendly practices will help producers access vital resources such as water and seeds. Developing strong social capital will reinforce project interventions, especially gender equity. Women will be empowered through greater knowledge of their economic rights and gain legal support for additional income-generating investments. Heifer Bolivia and its partners will promote women’s leadership and participation in the decision-making processes at the family and organizational levels.
